d:
A couple of months have passed after our protagonist and his lover Erza Scarlet have established their own guild, The Coven. By chance, he meets Lucy Heartfilia, he's next potential conque....er I mean recruit for the guild. Someone he can guide on the path of sex, corruption and bimbofication.

Thank so much for liking my work.
